full_summary:
### Tender Notice for Webmaster Services

#### Title
SPICT - SAEA - A.17 Administrateur de sites web / TBIPS - PSIB - A.17 Webmaster

#### Reference and Solicitation Numbers
- Reference Number: cb-53-36366952
- Solicitation Number: 5000078080

#### Tender Details
This tender is subject to amendment 3. The tender closing date is Tuesday, April 2, 2024, at 2:00 PM EDT and the tender status is expired.

#### Business Requirements
The Canadian Nuclear Safety Commission (CNSC) seeks proposals for the provision of webmaster services, including the development and publication of web pages, conversion of PDFs into accessible formats, and quality assurance checks. 

The work shall be performed using the Government of Canada/Canada.ca Design System standards. The successful contractor is expected to code and convert web pages on the development server, assess for accessibility, conduct a quality assurance check of their work, including broken links, make changes according to feedback and then publish the work online.

#### Additional Information
The anticipated Contract Start Date is not specified, and the anticipated Contract End Date is also not specified. The procurement method is the competitive-selective tendering process. The proposal evaluation and selection criteria are based on the highest combined rating of technical merit and price.

#### Tender Documents
Tender documents can be accessed on the Canada Buy Service, the official source for Canadian Government procurement. 

#### Contact Information
For questions and clarification on this tender, kindly contact CNSC Solicitation at E-mail: [solicitation-demandedesoumission@cnsc-ccsn.gc.ca](mailto:solicitation-demandedesoumission@cnsc-ccsn.gc.ca), Telephone: (000) 000-0000.

#### Attachments
